I'd like to get a second opinion from this young lady."/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Harvey "Very well..."/speak Harvey "$q 84 null#@, what do you think {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} should do?#$r 84 40 event_george1#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} should follow Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}'s advice.#$r 85 -40 event_george2#{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} knows what's best for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}} own body."/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection George 2/emote George 28/speak George "Fine.
